title: When applying to college do I have to show my high school GPA if I went to community college first? - Quora

response.answer_text: You probably will have to. If your community college transcript is better than your high school transcript, though, that should be OK. You can explain in your essay how you feel that you have matured and are better ready for college than you were when you were in high school.

If you are applying as a TRANSFER student with 1 to 2 years of community college courses, they will usually not want or request your high school transcript, but it is up to each college to decide what they will ask for; there isn’t a universal rule.
